---
description: An env for React MF host apps
labels: ['react', 'microfrontends', 'host', 'env']
---

This env supports the previewing of module federation host applications.

See the [my-react-env.bit-env.ts](https://bit.cloud/learnbit-react/module-federation/envs/mf-react-env/~code/my-react-env.bit-env.ts) file to learn more.
